text: Aarthi, who is also called Harathi, is an Indian actress, comedian, and TV host who works in Tamil movies and TV dramas. She started as a child artist in the late 1990s and later appeared in stand-up comedy shows like Super10 and Lollu Sabha. She has acted in movies such as Giri (2004), Padikkadavan (2009), and Kutty (2010). Category:Living people Category:20th-century Indian actors Category:21st-century Indian actors Category:Indian movie actresses
title: Aarthi Ganeshkar
